description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability identified as CVE-2024-20658, apply the following security updates:

1. Ensure that the affected systems are updated with the appropriate patches from Microsoft.
2. Download and apply the updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog linked below:
   - [KB5034171](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034171)
   - [KB5034134](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034134)
   - [KB5034123](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
   - [KB5034184](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034184)
   - [KB5034121](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121)
   - [KB5034130](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034130)
   - [KB5034127](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034127)
   - [KB5034122](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
   - [KB5034129](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034129)
   - [KB5034119](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034119)
3. Restart affected systems to ensure that the updates are fully applied.

**Details**:
- This series of updates addresses the elevation of privilege issue associated with Microsoft Virtual Hard Disk.
- It is crucial for maintaining the integrity and security of the affected systems.
- Please consult the KB articles for each update for further information on installation and system requirements.

**Preconditions**:
- Systems must be running at least the affected build numbers indicated for the respective updates.
- Ensure that system backups are performed before applying these updates to prevent data loss due to unforeseen issues.
